posts.post_content:
Its a cheap multi-use creature that can survive pyroclasm (If you didn't want it to survive that, you would have included a lightning bolt or incinerate instead). It does lots of things almost well. It is unique and causes strange board calculations.   
Everytime it comes out in my group (at least every other month), we shout its nickname in mock disgust: "**EFFING BLAZIGY**".   
A card doesn't have to be good to be loved. It is so much fun to attack with in multi-player magic.
posts.html:
Its a cheap multi-use creature that can survive pyroclasm (If you didn't want it to survive that, you would have included a lightning bolt or incinerate instead). It does lots of things almost well. It is unique and causes strange board calculations.

A card doesn't have to be good to be loved. It is so much fun to attack with in multi-player magic.

posts.post_content: [Furnace of Rath](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Furnace of Rath) or other damage-doubling effects make this go boom, as the first one deals 3 \* 2 = 6 damage to the second one, which deals (3 + 6) \* 2 = 18 damage to the third one, which deals (3 + 18) \* 2 = 42 to the fourth one, which deals (3 + 42) \* 2 = 90 damage to a [Stuffy Doll](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stuffy Doll), which deals 90 \* 2 = 180 damage to your opponent, who hopefully dies.
posts.html:

posts.post_content: mmm... I'm not so sure this is as terrible as it looks - no matter what you still get 3 damage off, kinda like a cheaper version of [Mudbutton Torchrunner](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mudbutton Torchrunner). posts.post_content: @Szyx: I don't see how that would work. Remember, the effect doesn't care about how much damage has been done to it unless it's been done by another Effigy, so the Shivan Meteor is useless. It doesn't matter how you kill the first Effigy, and the fourth one will only deal 12 damage upon dying. So I guess with four of these and a Lightning Bolt you can kill a Phyrexian Dreadnought.
posts.html:
@Szyx: I don't see how that would work. Remember, the effect doesn't care about how much damage has been done to it unless it's been done by another Effigy, so the Shivan Meteor is useless. posts.post_content:
[Mimic Vat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mimic Vat)  
[Splinter Twin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Splinter Twin)  
[Sun Dial of the Infinite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sun Dial of the Infinite)  
  
question: how do I strike the match?  
[Lightning Bolt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Bolt) and [Incinerate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Incinerate) work for a single use but I'd like something with more bang for the buck.  
  
Maybe go red/white  
[Arbalest Elite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Arbalest Elite)  
[Ajani Vengeant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ajani Vengeant)  
  
I'm sure you could find enough protection from red creatures to splash in some [Inferno](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Inferno) and [Pyroclasm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pyroclasm)
posts.html:
Mimic Vat

question: how do I strike the match?
Lightning Bolt and Incinerate work for a single use but I'd like something with more bang for the buck.
